Bantu kuya ne bana kudi Yezu, bua abatenteke bianza, abalombele kudi Mvidi Mukulu. Kadi balongi ba Yezu kutandisha bantu abu.
Yezu kuamba ne: Lekelayi bana bavue kundi. Kanubakandiki to. Bualu Bukalenga bua mu diulu mbua badi bu bana.
Kubatentekaye bianza. Pashishe kumukaye muaba awu.
Muntu kampande uvua muye kudi Yezu, umukonka ne: Mulongeshi, bua meme kupeta muoyi wa kashidi, ndi ne bua kuenza bualu buimpe kaayi?
Yezu kumuebeja ne:  Udi unkonka bua kumanya bualu budi buimpe bua tshinyi? Udi muimpe udi amu umue. Pawikala musue kupeta muoyi kudiye, itaba ku mikenji yende.
Muntu awu kukonka ne: Ngitabe ku mikenji kaayi? Yezu kuandamuna ne: Kushipi muntu. Kubueledi mukaji wa bende mu nzubu. Kuibi. Kushiminyinyi muntu bualu.
Nemeka tatuebe ne mamuebe. Nanga mukuebe muudi mudinange wewe mene.
Nsongalume kumuandamuna ne: Ndi mukumbaje mikenji yonsu ayi. Tshindi ne bua kuenza kabidi ntshinyi?
Yezu kumuandamuna ne: Paudi musue kuikala muakane tshishiki, uye kupana bionsu biudi nabi, wambike bapele makuta abi. Nanku newikale ne biuma mu diulu. Pashishe ufike bua kundonda.
Kadi nsongalume umvua nanku, kuyaye mubungame bikole, bualu uvua ne mpetu ya bungi.
Pashishe Yezu kuambila balongi bende ne: Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: bidi bikole bua muena biuma kubuela mu Bukalenga bua mu diulu.
Ndi nnujadikila kabidi ne: bu mudibi bikole bua nyama wa kamelu kubuela mu disu dia kashingi, ke mudibi bikole bipite bua muena mpetu kubuelaye mu Bukalenga bua Mvidi Mukulu.
Balongi bumvua miaku eyi, kukemabu bikole, bakonka ne: Nanku udibu mua kusungila nnganyi?
Yezu ubatangila, kubambilaye ne: Ebi bidi bikolela bantu. Kadi bionsu bidi biteketela Mvidi Mukulu.
Ke Petro kuebeja Yezu ne: Mona, tuetu tudi bashiye bionsu bua kukulonda. Kadi tshituapeta ntshinyi?

Yezu kubambila ne:  Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: pasomba Muana wa muntu mu nkuasa wende wa lumu mu buloba bupiabupia, nuenu bavua bandonde, nenusombe penu mu nkuasa dikumi ne ibidi, bua kulumbuluisha bisamba dikumi ne bibidi bia bena Izrayele.

Kabidi muntu yonsu udi ushiya mu dina dianyi nzubu yende, bana babu ba balume ne ba bakaji, tatuende, mamuende, bana badiye mulele, nansha madimi ende, neapete bipite misangu lukama. Neapete kabidi muoyi wa kashidi.
Kadi ba bungi badi mpindiewu ba kumpala, nebikale ba ndekelu. Ba bungi badi mpindiewu ba ndekelu, nebikale ba kumpala.
— Umvuayi: Bukalenga bua mu diulu mbufuanangane ne muena budimi uvua mumuke kuende ne dinda dionsu, bua kuangata bantu ku mudimu, bua badime budimi buende bua nwinyo.
Uvua mumvuangane nabu bua kubateta difutu divua muena mudimu ne bua kupeta, lukanu lumue lua tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole ku dituku. Ke kubatumaye bua badime budimi buende bua nwinyo.
Kupatukaye kabidi mu njila diba dia tshitema. Kumonaye bantu bakuabu bimane mu tshisalu, kabayi ne mudimu wa kuenza.
Kubambilaye ne: “Nuenu kabidi nuye kukuata mudimu mu budimi buanyi bua nwinyo. Nennutete difutu dikumbane.”
Ke kuyabu. Muena budimi kupatuka kabidi munda munya, pashishe ku diba isatu wa dilolu, kuenzaye anu momumue.
Kupatukaye kabidi ku diba itanu wa dilolu, kusanganaye bantu bakuabu bimane mu tshisalu. Kubakonkaye ne: “Dituku dijima nudi amu muaba ewu, kanuyi nukuata mudimu bua tshinyi?”
Bobu kumuandamuna ne: “Bualu muntu ki mmutuangate ku mudimu to.” Ke yeye kubambila ne: “Nanku nuenu kabidi nuye kukuata mudimu mu budimi buanyi bua nwinyo.”

Dilolu dikumbana, muena budimi bua nwinyo kuambila mfumu wa bena mudimu ne: “Ubikile bena mudimu, ubafute difutu diabu. Utuadije ne bantu ba ndekelu bamvua muangate ku mudimu. Neujikije ne bantu bamvua muangate kumpala.”
Nanku bavua batuadije mudimu pa diba itanu wa dilolu, kufikabu. Muntu yonsu kuangata lukanu lumue.
Pavua, bavuabu bangate ku mudimu kumpala, bafike, bavua bela meji ne: netupete bipite bia bakuabu. Kadi bavua bapete pabu muntu yonsu lukanu lumue.
Kadi, bamane kupeta difutu diabu, kutontololabu bivua muena budimi bua nwinyo muenze,

bamuambila ne: “Udi mutete bena mudimu, bauvua muangate ku mudimu ku ndekelu, difutu dia momumue ne dietu. Kadi bobu bavua bakuate mudimu amu diba dimue. Tuetu tuvua bakuate mudimu mu munya mukole dituku dijima!”
Kadi muena budimi kuandamuna umue wa kudibu ne: “Mulunda wanyi, tshiena mudie kantu kebe to. Kuvua muitabe bua kukuata mudimu, kupeta lukanu lumue ku dituku anyi?
Nanku, angata difutu diebe, umbuka. Ndi musue kufuta muntu umvua muangate ku mudimu ku ndekelu difutu dia momumue ne diebe.
Tshiena mua kuenza mundi musue ne nkanu yanyi anyi? Udi umvua lubabu, bualu ndi ne muoyi muimpe anyi?”
Ke Yezu kuamba kabidi ne: nanku ba ndekelu nebikale ba kumpala; ba kumpala nebikale ba ndekelu.
Yezu uvua ubanda ku Yerushalayime. Uvua amu ne balongi bende dikumi ne babidi. Pavuabu baya nkayabu mu njila, uvua ubambila ne:
— Telejayi. Tudi tubanda ku Yerushalayime. Muana wa muntu nebamufile mu bianza bia bamfumu ba batuangaji, ne bia balongeshi ba mikenji. Nebamufundile tshibawu tshia lufu.
Nebamufile mu bianza bia benyi. Bantu abu nebamuseke, nebamufute mikaba, nebamupopele pa mutshi mutshiamakane. Kadi papita matuku asatu, neabike ku lufu.
Ke mukaji wa Zebede kusemena ne bana bende kudi Yezu. Kudielaye panshi, bu muntu udi musue kulomba tshintu.
Ke Yezu kumukonka ne: Tshiudi ujinga ntshinyi? Mamu awu kumulomba ne: Pawatuadija bukalenga buebe, anyisha bua bana banyi ba balume aba basombe ewu ku diebe dia balume, munga ku diebe dia bakaji.
Yezu kuandamuna ne:  Kanuena bajingulule tshinudi nulomba nansha. Dikopu dia dikenga dinganua, nudi mua kudinua anyi? Bobu kumuandamuna ne: Tudi mua kudinua.

Ke Yezu kubambila ne:  Bushuwa, nenunue dikopu dianyi. Kadi meme tshiena mua kujadika udi mua kusomba ku dianyi dia balume, nansha ku dianyi dia bakaji. Nebasombemu kudi bantu badi Tatu mulongoluele miaba eyi.
Balongi bakuabu dikumi bumvua bualu abu, kufikilabu balongi babidi aba bena muntu munda.
Ke Yezu kubabikila bonsu, wamba ne: Nudi bamanye ne: bamfumu ba bisamba bikuabu badi batumina bantu babu diyi dia bumfumu. Bantu banene kabidi badi baleja bantu mudibu bamfumu.
Kadi munkatshi muenu kabiena mua kuenzeka nanku to. Wa kunudi udi musue kuikala ne muanzu, ikala muena mudimu wenu.
Wa kunudi udi musue kuikala ku mutu kua bonsu, ikala mupika wenu.
Nanku Muana wa muntu kena mufike bua bamuenzele mudimu, kadi amu bua kukuatshila bantu bakuabu mudimu, ne bua kufila muoyi wende bua kupikula bantu ba bungi.
Yezu umuka ne balongi bende mu Yeriko, bantu ba bungi kubatonda.
Mpofu ibidi ivua misombe ku muelelu wa njila. Pumvuyi ne: Yezu udi upita, kuelayi mbila ne: Mfumu, Muana wa Davide, utumvuile luse!
Bantu kukanyina mpofu ayi bua ipuwe. Kadi ivua amu yela mbila mikole mipite ne:  Mfumu, Muana wa Davide, utumvuile luse!
Ke Yezu kuimana, kuyibikila, kuyikonka ne: Nudi basue, nnuenzele tshinyi?
Mpofu kuandamuna ne: Mfumu, mesu etu atabale!
Yezu kuyumvuila luse, kulenga mesu ayi. Bantu babidi aba kutabala diakamue, kutonda Yezu.
Yezu ne balongi bende basemena mu Yerushalayime, kufikabu pabuipi ne musoku wa Betfaje, ku mukuna wa Olive. Yezu kutuma balongi bende babidi,
kubambila ne: Nuye mu musoku ewu udi kumpala kuenu. Nenusanganemu diakamue mpunde mukaji musuika pamue ne muanende. Nuyisulule, nuvue nayi kundi.
Pikalabu bamba bualu, nuandamune ne: “Mfumu udi nayi dijinga.” Nebanyishe musangu umue bua nuenu kuya nayi.
Ebi bivua bienzeka bua kukumbaja miaku ya muambi ya ne:
“Ambilayi bena mu Siyone ne: Ke mukalenga wenu awu udi ufika kunudi. Udi mudipuekeshe bikole, mubande pa nyama wa mpunde mukaji, ne pa muana wa nyama wa mpunde.”
Nanku balongi kuya. Kuenzabu bivua Yezu mubambile.
Kufikabu ne nyama wa mpunde mukaji ne muanende. Kutekabu bilamba biabu pa nyama ayi. Yezu kubandapu.
Bantu bavule kuadija bilamba biabu panshi mu njila. Bakuabu bavua bakosa mabeji a mitshi, baela mu njila.

Bavua benda kumpala kua Yezu, ne bavua bamulonda mu nyima, bonsu kuela mbila ne: “Lumu tuikale kudi Muana wa Davide! Udi uvua mu dina dia Maweja-Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu amuele lupemba! Lumu bikale kudi Mvidi Mukulu mu diulu!
Pavua Yezu mubuele mu Yerushalayime, bantu bonsu bavua bapampakana, bakonkangana ne: Ewu nnganyi?
Bantu bakuabu bavua bandamuna ne: Yezu, muambi, muena Nazarete wa mu Ngalileya.

Yezu kubuela mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu. Kuipataye mu nzubu amu bantu bonsu bavua basumbisha bintu, ne bavua babisumba. Kutonkolaye mesa a bashintudi ba makuta, ne nkuasa ya basumbishi ba nyunyi ya nkudimba.
Pashishe kubambilaye ne:  Mikanda ya tshijila idi yamba ne: “Nebi-nyike nzubu wanyi ne: ngwa ditendelela.”Kadi nuenu nukadi bamuandamune muaba wa buivi!
Bampofu ne batebuki kusemena kuvua Yezu mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu. Kujikijaye masama abu.
Bamfumu ba batuangaji, ne balongeshi ba mikenji, kufika munda pa kumona malu a dikema avua Yezu wenza, ne bana bavua bela mbila mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu ne: “Lumu tuikale kudi Muana wa Davide!”

Kukonkabu Yezu ne: Udi mumvue mudibu bamba anyi? Yezu kubandamuna ne: Eyowa. Kadi kanuena babale Mukanda wa tshijila anyi? Badi bafundamu ne: “Uvua muenze bua bana batekete mene, nansha batshidi bamua mabele, bakutumbishe.”
Pashishe kubashiyaye, kupatuka mu tshimenga, kuya mu Betanya. Kulalaye muaba awu.
Butshia dinda, pavua Yezu upingana mu tshimenga, kumvuaye nzala.
Kumonaye mutshi wa mfiku ku muelelu wa njila. Kuyaye pabuipi nawu, kusangana anu mabeji. Ke kutshipaye mutshi awu ne: Wewe kuakukuama kabidi bimuma kashidi! Diakamue mutshi kuumawu.
Balongi bamona nanku, kukemabu. Kuebejabu Yezu ne: Mutshi wa mfiku ewu mmuume anu lukasa nanku bua tshinyi?

Yezu kubandamuna ne: Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: nuenu bikale ne ditaba, kanuyi nuela mpata, kanuakuenza anu tshindi muenzele mutshi wa mfiku ewu nansha. Kadi diba adi nenuambile mukuna ewu ne: “Umuke paudi apu, uye kudiela mu mayi manene,” mukuna neuye.
Bu nuenu nuitaba, nenupete bionsu binudi nulomba mu ditendelela.

Yezu kubuela mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu. Pavuaye mutuadije kulongesha, bamfumu ba batuangaji, ne bakulu ba bena Yuda, kusemena kudiye, bamukonka ne: Malu audi wenza aa, udi muenze ne bumfumu kaayi? Udi mukupeshe bumfumu ebu nnganyi?
Yezu kubandamuna ne: Meme kabidi ndi musue kunuela lukonku amu lumue. Nuenu bangandamune, nanku nennuambile bumfumu bundi ngenza nabu bionsu ebi.

Yowanane, udi mumutume bua kutua bantu mu mayi, Mvidi Mukulu anyi mbantu? Kadi kuelanganabu meji munkatshi muabu nkayabu ne: Tuetu bandamune ne: “mMvidi Mukulu nguvua mumutume,” neatuebeje ne: “Kadi kanuena bitabe Yowanane bua tshinyi?”
Tuetu bambe ne: “Bantu ke bavua bantumine,” tudi ne bua kutshina bantu. Bitalu bonsu badi anu bitabe ne: Yowanane mmuambi!
Ke kuandamunabu Yezu ne:  Katuena bamanye to. Nanku Yezu kubandamuna kabidi ne: Meme panyi tshiena nnuambila bumfumu bundi ngenza nabu bionsu ebi.
Yezu kubakonka kabidi ne: Bua lusumuinu elu, nudi nuamba penu bishi? Muntu uvua ne bana ba balume babidi. Kuambilaye wa kumpala ne: “Muananyi, lelu uye kuenza mudimu mu budimi buanyi bua nwinyo.”
Muana kubenga ne: “Tshiena musue to.” Kadi pashishe kunyingalalaye bua miaku yende ayi, kuyaye mu budimi.
Ke tatu awu kulomba kabidi muana muibidi, bua aye ku budimi. Muana kuitaba lukasa ne: “Eyowa, mfumu.” Kadi nanshaye kuya to.

Ku bana babidi aba, udi muenze tshivua tatuende musue nnganyi? Kumuandamunabu ne: Anu muana wa kumpala.Nanku Yezu kubambila ne: Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: balambuishi ba bitadi, ne bakaji bena buendenda, nebanudianjidile mu Bukalenga bua Mvidi Mukulu.

Bualu Yowanane-Batiste mmufike kunudi, bua kunuleja njila mululame. Kadi kanuena bamuitabe to. Balambuishi ba bitadi, ne bakaji bena buendenda, bakamuitaba. Kadi nansha nuenu bamone bobu benza nanku, kanuena banyingalala nansha kakese, bua numone mua kumuitaba.

— Telejayi lusumuinu lukuabu. Kuvua muntu ne budimi buende. mMukunemu mionji ya nwinyo. Kunyungululaye budimi abu ne lupangu. Kumbulaye kabidi tshiina bua kuasamu tshikaminu tshia maluvu. Kuasaye kazubu katumbuke ka batentekedi.
Tshikondu tshia kupola tumuma tshikumbana, kutumaye bena mudimu bende kudi bavuaye mushile budimu abu, bua kupeta tuende tumuma.
Kadi bantu abu kukuata bena mudimu bende abu, kukuma umue, kushipa mukuabu, muisatu kumuasabu mabue.
Ke muena budimi kutuma tshiakabidi bena mudimu bakuabu ba bungi bapite ba kumpala. Kadi bavua ne budimi, kubenzela anu mushindu umue.
Ku ndekelu kubatuminaye muanende, wela meji ne: “Nebanemeke muananyi.”
Kadi bavua ne budimi bamona muana, kuambilanganabu ne: “Ke washala muena budimi wawa. Tuyayi, mmushipe! Nanku netushale ne budimi buende kashidi!”
Kumukuatabu, kuyabu kumushipela ku mpenga kua budimi.
Yezu kubakonka ne: Pafika muena budimi, neenze tshinyi ne bavuaye mushile budimi aba?
Kumuandamunabu ne: Kakumvuila bantu babi aba luse to. Neabashipe bonsu. Neashile bantu bakuabu budimi buende, bua bamupeshe pa diba tshiende tshitupa tshia bimuma bidibu banowa.

Ke Yezu kubambila ne:  Kanuena banji kubala mukanda wa Mvidi Mukulu anyi? Mbafundemu ne: “Dibue divua bibaki bimansha, ndishale dibue didi dishindika nzubu. Ke mudi Maweja-Nangila muenze nanku. Bualu bua dikema butuvua bamone!
— Ke Yezu kuamba kabidi ne: ke pandi nnujadikila ne: nebanunyenge Bukalenga bua Mvidi Mukulu, bua kubupesha tshisamba tshidi mua kukuama bimuma bilenga. [
Muntu wadishinda pa dibue edi, neatshibukilepu. Kadi pikala dibue diponena muntu, nedimuvingutule. ]
Bamfumu ba batuangaji ne Baparushe kumvua nsumuinu ya Yezu. Kujingululabu ne: udi utuamba tuetu.
Nenku kukebabu muvuabu mua kumukuata. Kadi bavua batshina bantu, bualu bantu bavua bitabe ne: Yezu mmuambi.
Yezu uvua ulongesha tshiakabidi bantu mu nsumuinu, ubambila ne:
— Bukalenga bua mu diulu mbufuanangane ne mukalenga wa ditunga, uvua mulongoluele muanende wa balume didia dinene dia dibaka.
Kutumaye bena mudimu bende bua kuvuluija bantu muvuaye mubabikile mu didia edi. Kadi bavuaye mubikile kubengabu.

Pashishe kutumaye bena mudimu bakuabu, ubambila ne: “Ambilayi bamvua mubikile ne: mpindiewu nkadi mumane kulongolola didia dianyi. Ndi mushipe ngombe milume, ne nyama mikuabu mimpe ya mafuta. Bionsu biakumbanyi! Vuayi mu didia dia dibaka!”
Kadi bavuaye mubikile kabavua bangata dibikila diende ne mushinga. Kuyabu ku midimu yabu, ewu ku budimi buende, munga ku mishinga yende.
Bakuabu kukuata bena mudimu, kubakengesha, kubashipa mene.
Mukalenga kufika munda bikole. Kutumaye tshiluilu tshiende, bua kushipa bashipianganyi aba, ne kuosha tshimenga tshiabu.
Pashishe kuambilaye bena mudimu bende ne: “Tukadi balongolole didia dia dibaka. Kadi bantu bamvua mubikile, kabatua badikumbanyine to.
Nenku nuye mu misesu minene ku biibi biatshimenga. Nubikile bonsu banuasangana, bua bafike mu didia.”
Bena mudimu abu kuya mu misesu minene, kusangisha bonsu bavuabu basangane, babi ne balenga. Nzubu wa didia dia dibaka kuwula bantu tente.
Mukalenga kubuela bua kumona bavua ku mesa. Kumonayemu muntu uvua kayi ne tshilamba tshia dibaka.
Kumukonkaye ne: “Mulunda wanyi, muudi mubuele apa nunku, kuyi ne tshilamba tshia dibaka, mbishi?” Kadi muntu awu nansha kuandamuna kalu to.
Nenku mukalenga kuambila bena mudimu ne: “Musuikayi ku makasa ne ku bianza. Numuimanshe pambelu mu midima, bua aye kudidilapu, asumakajilapu menu.”
Bualu badibu babikile badi bavule, kadi badibu basungule badi bakese.
Diba adi Baparushe kubuela mu tshipangu, kushindika mua kukuata Yezu mu buteyi ku miaku yende.

Kutumabu balongi babu bakuabu, ne bamue ba bena Erode, bua kuambila Yezu ne: Mulongeshi, tudi bamanye ne: wewe udi wamba malu malelela. Udi ulongesha amu patoke tshidi Mvidi Mukulu musue bua muntu enze. Kuena utshina bidi bantu bela meji, bualu kuena ukakala muntu. Kuena utshina buneme bua muntu.
Nanku anji kutuambila pebe muudi mumone: bilondeshile mikenji yetu, tudi mua kufuta tshitadi kudi mukalenga wa bakalenga muena Rome anyi katufutshi?
Kadi Yezu uvua mujingulule meji abu mabi. Kubambilaye ne: Nuenu bena mpala ibidi, nudi nunteya bua tshinyi?
Ndejayi makuta anudi nuteta nawu tshitadi. Kumulejabu makuta.
Yezu kubakonka ne: Mpala ewu ne dina, bidibu bafunde apa, mbia nganyi?
Kuandamunabu ne: Bia mukalenga wa bakalenga. Ke Yezu kubambila ne: Nunku futayi mukalenga wa bakalenga bintu bidi bunutangila, kadi lambulayi Mvidi Mukulu pende bidi bimutangila.
Bamane kumvua muvua Yezu muandamune, kukemabu bikole. Kumushiyabu, kuya.
Dituku adi mene, Basaduke bakuabu kufika kudi Yezu. (Ke bantu badi bamba ne: bafue kabena babika). Kukonkabu Yezu ne:
— Mulongeshi, Moshe uvua muambe ne: “Muntu mufue, kayi mulele muana, muanabu angate mukaji mukamba, bua asanguile muanabu udi mufue.
Kuetu eku kuvua bana ba muntu muanda mutekete. Wa kumpala kusela mukaji. Kufuaye, kayi mulele nende muana. Nanku kushilaye muanabu mukaji awu.
Muanabu kabidi nansha kulela nende; pashishe muisatu, amu nanku, too ne ku wa muanda mutekete.
Bonsu aba bamane kufua, mukaji kubalonda.
Nanku dituku diabika bantu bafue, mukaji neikale wa nganyi ku bonsu aba muanda mutekete? Bualu buonsu buabu bavua anu babayende.
Yezu kubandamuna ne: Nudi batupakane bikole! Bualu kanuena bajingulule tshidibu bafunde mu Mukanda wa tshijila. Kanuena nansha bamanye bukole budi Mvidi Mukulu nabu.
Bualu pabika bantu ku bafue, nebikale bafuanangane ne batumibue ba Mvidi Mukulu badi mu diulu, kabayi baselangana kabidi to.
Kadi bua dibika dia bafue, kanuena babale bivua Mvidi Mukulu munujadikile ne:
“Meme ndi Mvidi Mukulu wa Abrahame, Mvidi Mukulu wa Izake, ne Mvidi Mukulu wa Yakobe ”  Nanku Mvidi Mukulu udi Mvidi Mukulu wa bantu badi ne muoyi, ki ngwa bafue to.
Bantu bavule bavua bamuteleja, kukemabu bikole bua bivuaye mulongeshe.
Baparushe bumvue ne: Yezu mmushikije Basaduke, kudisangishabu pabu.
Umue wabu, mulongeshi wa mikenji, uvua musue kuteta Yezu. Kumukonkaye ne:
— Mulongeshi, mukenji udi munene, mupite mikuabu yonsu, mmukenji kaayi?
Yezu kumuandamuna ne: “Unange Maweja-Nangila Mvidi Mukulu webe ne muoyi webe mujima, ne bukole buebe buonsu, ne lungenyi luebe lujima.”
Awu ke mukenji mupite bunene, ne wa kumpala.
Mukenji muibidi, wa bunene bua momumue, udi nunku: “Unange mukuebe, bu muudi mudinange wewe."
Mikenji yonsu ya Moshe, ne bionsu bidi bambi balongesha, bidi amu mu mikenji eyi ibidi.
Baparushe bavua basangile kaba kamue. Yezu kubakonka ne:
— Bua Kristu nudi nuela meji munyi? Udi wa ku ndelanganyi ya nganyi? Bobu kumuandamuna ne: Udi wa ku ndelanganyi ya Davide.
Yezu kubebeja ne: Kadi mmunyi muvua Davide, uvuabu balombola kudi Mueyelu wa tshijila, umubikila ne: “Mfumu?” Bualu Davide uvua wamba ne:
“Maweja-Nangila Mvidi Mukulu uvua wamba Mfumu wanyi ne: Somba ku dianyi dia balume, too ne pangateka bena lukuna bebe muinshi mua makasa ebe.”
Pikala Davide umubikila “Mfumu,” mudi Kristu mua kuikala wa ku ndelanganyi ya Davide mmunyi?
Muntu nansha umue kavua mua kuandamuna ku lukonku alu. Kutuadija ku dituku adi, muntu nansha umue kavua ukimina kabidi kumuebeja bualu.
Ke Yezu kuambila bantu ne balongi bende pamue ne:
— Balongeshi ba mikenji ne Baparushe badi ne bumfumu bua kumvuija bantu mikenji ya Moshe.
Nanku nudi ne bua kubatumikila, kukumbaja bionsu bidibu banulongesha. Kadi kanuidikiji mudibu benza to. Bualu kabena benza mudibu balongesha.
Badi basuika mabuki a bujitu, baambuisha bantu pa makaya abu. Kadi bobu kabena mua kualenga nansha ne munu bua kuambula.
Badi benza midimu yabu yonsu bua bantu babamone. mBafunde miaku ya tshijila pa mikaba minene, idibu basuika pa mpala nansha ku maboku. Binkutu biabu bidi ne nzemba minene kabidi.
Mu bibilu bia didia, mbasue kusomba miaba ya bantu baneme. Mu nzubu ya ditendelela ya bena Yuda, badi bajinga kusomba miaba mimpe kumpala kua bantu bakuabu.
Badi bananga bua bantu bahele muoyi ne kanemu, miaba idi bantu bakungila, kabidi bua bababikile ne: “Mulongeshi.”
Kadi nuenu kabanubikidi ne: “Mulongeshi.” Bualu nudi bonsu bantu bamue. Mulongeshi wenu udi amu umue.
Pa buloba kanubikidi muntu ne: “Tatu.” Bualu Tatu wenu udi amu umue, wa mu diulu.
Kabanubikidi kabidi ne: “Muludiki,” bualu nudi ne muludiki amu umue, ke Kristu.
Udi munene kunudi, adienze muena mudimu wenu.
Wadibandisha, nebamupuekeshe; wadipuekesha, nebamubandishe.

— Nuenu balongeshi ba mikenji ne Baparushe, nudi bena diakabi, bualu nudi bena mpala ibidi! Nudi nupangisha bantu, bua kababuedi mu Bukalenga bua mu diulu. Nuenu mene kanuena numubuela. Kanuena nansha banyishe bua babuelemu kudi badi bakeba kubuela.

Nuenu balongeshi ba mikenji ne Baparushe, nudi bena diakabi, bualu nudi bena mpala ibidi! Nudi nutendelela mutantshi mule, bua bantu banumone bu bantu bimpe. Kadi nudi nunyenga bakaji bakamba bionsu bidibu nabi. Nanku nebanunyoke bikole bipite!

Nuenu balongeshi ba mikenji ne Baparushe, nudi bena diakabi, bualu nudi bena mpala ibidi! Nudi nutambakana pa buloba bujima, ne pa mayi manene, bua kupeta muntu udi mua kukudimuna mutshima wende. Kadi panudi bamane kumupeta, nudi numupisha tshibawu tshia kapia ka tshinyangu, tshipite tshienu misangu ibidi.

Nudi bena diakabi, bualu nudi basue kulombola bakuabu, kadi nudi bampofu! Nudi nuamba ne: “Muntu udi uditshipa, utela nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu, mutshipu kawena umukuata. Kadi muntu udi uditshipa, utela tshiamu tshia mpawungi tshidi mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu, mutshipu udi umukuata.”
Nudi bantu batshimbakane, bampofu! Tshidi ne mushinga mupite ntshinyi? Tshiamu tshia mpawungi, peshi nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu, udi uvuija tshiamu tshia mpawungi etshi tshia tshijila?
Nudi nuamba kabidi ne: “Muntu udi uditshipa, utela tshilambuilu, mutshipu kawena umukuata. Kadi bu yeye uditshipa, utela mulambu udi pa tshilambuilu, mutshipu udi umukuata.”
Nudi bampofu! Tshidi ne mushinga mupite ntshinyi? Mulambu anyi, peshi tshilambuilu tshidi tshivuija mulambu awu wa tshijila?
Udi uditshipa, utela tshilambuilu, udi uditshipa, utela tshilambuilu ne bionsu bidipu.
Udi uditshipa, utela nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu, udi uditshipa, utela nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu, ne Mvidi Mukulu mene udi usombamu.
Udi uditshipa, utela diulu, udi uditshipa, utela nkuasa wa Mvidi Mukulu, ne Mvidi Mukulu mene udi usombapu.

Nuenu balongeshi ba mikenji ne Baparushe, nudi bena diakabi, bualu nudi bena mpala ibidi! Nudi nulambula Mvidi Mukulu tshia dikumi tshia biakudia bienu, nansha tshia luenyi, tshia tshidibi a luenyi, ne tshia tshikote. Kadi nudi nulengulula malu mapite bunene adi mikenji itulongesha, bu mudi kuenzela bantu bimpe, kufuilangana luse, ne kuitaba Mvidi Mukulu. Kadi ke malu anuvua ne bua kuenza, kanuyi nulengulula makuabu.
Nuenu nudi basue kulombola bakuabu, kadi nudi bampofu! Nudi nutata maluvu enu, numusha kishi. Kadi kamelu, nudi nukumina!

Nuenu balongeshi ba mikenji ne Baparushe, nudi bena diakabi, bualu nudi bena mpala ibidi! Nudi nusukula panyima pa dikopu ne pa dilonga. Kadi munda muabi mudi amu biakudia binuvua bibe, nansha bapete ku lukuka.
Wewe Parushe, udi mpofu! Usukule bangabanga munda mua dikopu. Nanku panyima padi, nepikale pimpe kabidi.

Nuenu balongeshi ba mikenji ne Baparushe, nudi bena diakabi, bualu nudi bena mpala ibidi! Nudi bafuanangane ne nkita milaba lupemba bimpe.  Idi imueneka mimpe ku mesu. Kadi munda muayi mudi muwule tente ne mifuba ya bantu bafue, kabidi ne bintu bibole bia mishindu yonsu.
Nuenu kabidi nudi numueneka bu bimpe kudi bantu, kadi munda muenu nudi amu bena mpala ibidi, ne bena malu mabi.
— Nuenu balongeshi ba mikenji ne Baparushe, nudi bena diakabi, bualu nudi bena mpala ibidi. Nudi nuibakila bambi nkita mimpe. Nudi nulengeja nkita ya bantu bavua bitaba Mvidi Mukulu.
Nudi nuamba ne: “Bu tuetu bikalepu pavua bankambua betu ne muoyi, katuvua mua kudisangisha nabu bua kushipa bambi nansha!”
Nanku nudi nuitaba munudi ndelanganyi ya bavua bashipa bambi.
Ee, tungunukayi! Numane mudimu uvua bankambua benu babange!
Nudi nyoka, kabidi bana ba nyoka! Nudi nuela meji ne: nenupanduke ku kapia ka tshinyangu anyi?

Nanku telejayi: nennutumine bambi, bena meji, ne balongeshi ba bushuwa ba mikenji. Nenushipe bamue. Nenupopele bakuabu ba mitshi mitshiamakane. Nenutute banga mikaba mu nzubu yenu ya kutendelela. Nenubalondakaje ku tshimenga ne ku tshimenga.

Nanku nenupie tshibawu tshia bantu bonsu ba pa buloba, bavuabu bashipe kapayi bualu, bituadije ku Abele, muntu muimpe uvua muitabe Mvidi Mukulu, too ne ku Zekarya, muana wa Barakiya, unuvua bashipele pankatshi pa muaba wa tshijila ne tshilambuilu.
Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: nebanyoke bena lelu bibi, bua lufu lua bantu bonsu aba.

— Yerushalayime, Yerushalayime, wewe udi ushipa bambi, wasa badi Mvidi Mukulu ukutumina mabue, ubashipa! Misangu bungi munyi imvua mujinge kusangisha bantu bebe pandi, bu mudi nzolu usangisha tuana tuende mu mapuapua. Kadi kanuvua basue to!
Nanku, nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu wenu awu neashale munda mutupu!
Ndi nnujadikila ne: kutuadija ku mpindiewu, kanuakummona kabidi, too ne panuela mbila ne: “Udi uvua mu dina dia Maweja-Nangila, Mvidi Mukulu amuele lupemba!
Yezu uvua upatuka mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu. Pavuaye wenda uya, balongi bende kusemena kudiye bua kumuleja mushindu uvuabu bibake nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu.
Kadi Yezu kubandamuna ne: Nudi nukema bionsu ebi! Kadi ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: ku nzubu ewu kakuakushala dibue diambata pa dikuabu to. Bionsu nebiupuke!

Yezu uvua musombe ku mukuna wa mitshi ya Olive. Ke balongi bende kusemena kudiye bobu nkayabu, bamukonka ne: Utuambile: malu awu neenzeke diba kaayi? Nebimanye bishi ne: ukadi pa kufika, kabidi ne: ndekelu wa buloba ukadi ukumbana?
Yezu kubandamuna ne: Nuadimukayi! Muntu kanushimi! 5Bualu bantu bavule nebafike, bangata dina dianyi, banuambila ne: “Meme ndi Kristu!” Nebashime bantu ba bungi.
Bualu bantu bavule nebafike, bangata dina dianyi, banuambila ne: “Meme ndi Kristu!” Nebashime bantu ba bungi.
Nenumvue mutoyi wa myita ya pabuipi, ne ngumu ya myita ya kule. Kadi kanutshinyi to. Ebi bionsu bidi ne bua kuenzeka; kadi ki nshikidilu wa buloba to!
Tshisamba netshiluishe tshikuabu. Bukalenga nebuluishe bukuabu. Biyole bia nzala nebienzeke. Buloba nebuzakale miaba mishilangane.
Malu onsu awu neikale bu makenga a kumpala adi akuata mukaji pa lulelu.
Nanku bantu nebanukuate, nebanufile bua banukengeshe. Nebanushipe. Bisamba bionsu nebinukine, bualu nudi nungitaba.
Tshikondu atshi bavule nebavile ditaba. Nebelelangane tshitungu, bakinangane.
Bambi ba dishima ba bungi nebamueneke. Nebadinge bantu bavule.
Bubi nebuvulangane. Nanku dinanga dia bantu ba bungi nedituye.
Kadi wananukila too ne ku ndekelu, nebamusungidile.
Lumu lua Disanka, nebalumanyishe mu buloba bujima, bua kujadikila bisamba bionsu ne: Mvidi Mukulu udi unubikila ku Bukalenga buende. Diba adi, nshikidilu wa buloba neafike.
— Nenumone tshidibu binyike ne: “Tshinyangu tshipite bubi”, tshivua muambi Danyele mutele.
Diba adi, badi mu Yudeya, baye kusokoma mu mikuna.
Wikala ku musonga wa nzubu, katuluki bua kuangata bidi mu nzubu.
Wikala mu madimi, kapinganyi kuende bua kuangata tshinkutu tshiende.
Matuku awu, nangananga bamamu badi ne mafu, ne badi bamusha bana, nebakenge!
Nutendelele Mvidi Mukulu, bua kanunyemi tshikondu tshibi, nansha dituku dia Dikisha!
Bualu tshikondu atshi, dikenga nedikale dikole, dipite makenga onsu avua menzeke ku ntuadijilu wa bukua bantu, too ne mpindiewu. Makenga a nanku kaakuenzeka kabidi to.
Bu Mvidi Mukulu kayi mukepeshe bungi bua matuku awu, muntu nansha umue kavua mua kupanda. Kadi mmuakepeshe, bualu bua bantu badiye musungule.
Nanku pikala muntu unuambila ne: “Tangila, Kristu udi apa,” nansha ne: “Udi kuaka,” kanumuitabi to.
Bualu baKristu ba dishima ne bambi ba dishima nebamueneke. Nebenze bishima binene, ne malu a dikema, bifuane mua kudinga bantu mene badi Mvidi Mukulu musungule, bu biobi mua kuenzeka.
Ke meme awu nnumanyisha malu aa, kaayi manji kuenzeka!
Nanku pikalabu banuambila ne: “Nyewu mu tshipela!” kanuyi to. Nansha banuambila ne: “Udi musokome apa!” kanuitabi to.
Bu mudi muele wa mvula upenya, umuka kudi diba dipatukila, umueneka diakamue ne kudidi dibuelela, ke muafika Muana wa muntu nanku.
Padi tshitalu, ke padi nyunyi ya mikanku idisangisha.
— Pajika matuku a dikenga awu, diakamue diba kadiakumueneka kabidi, ngondu kakukenka, mitotu neituke mulu, makole a mulu neanyungakane.
Tshimanyinu tshia Muana wa muntu netshimueneke mulu. Bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba nebidile miadi. Nebimone Muana wa muntu utuluka mu mavuba, ne bukole bua bungi, kabidi ne butumbi buonsu.
Mpungi munene neadile. Muana wa muntu neafume batumibue bende ku ntengu inayi ya buloba. Nebasangishe badiye musungule, bafume ku ntengu ne ntengu ya buloba ayi.
— Nujingulule tshidi mutshi wa mfiku unuleja. Patshidi ntonga mitekete, matamba asasa, nudi bamanye ne: tshikondu tshia luya tshikadi pabuipi.
Momumue kabidi, panuamona bionsu abi, numanye ne: bualu bunene abu budi pabuipi, bukadi ku tshiibi.
Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: bantu ba tshikondu etshi kabakusa bonsu, bualu bujima abu kabuyi buanji kuenzeka.
Diulu ne buloba nebijimine. Kadi miaku yanyi kashidi kayena ijimina to.
— Kadi dituku adi, nansha diba adi, muntu nansha umue kena mubimanye, nansha batumibue ba mu diulu, nansha Muana.  Anu Tatu nkayende ke udi mubimanye.
Muvuabi bienzeka mu matuku a Nowa, ke muikalabi kabidi dituku didi Muana wa muntu ufika.
Mvula mukole awu kayi muanji kuloka, bantu bavua badia, banua, baselangana, baselesha bana babu ba bakaji, too ne ku dituku divua Nowa mubuele mu buatu.
Bantu kabavua bajingulule bivua bienzeka. Kupapukilabu amu pasua mvula mukole mupite ubanga kuloka, ubabutula bonsu. Ke muafika Muana wa muntu.
Diba adi, pikala bantu babidi mu budimi, nebangate umue, bashiye mukuabu.
Pikala bakaji babidi bapela ntete ku dibue, nebangate umue, balekele mukuabu.
Dimukayi, bualu kanuena bamanye dituku diafika Mfumuenu.
Numanye bimpe ne: bu muena nzubu mudianze kumanya diba didi muivi mua kufika butuku, neashale mutabale. Kakumulekela upanda nzubu wende to.
Ke panudi ne bua kuikala bamane kudilongolola, bualu Muana wa muntu neafike diba dinudi kanuyi belele meji.
— Muena mudimu muimpe, wa meji, nnganyi? Ngewu udi mfumuende mupeshe mudimu wa kukuba bena mudimu bende, ne wa kubapesha biakudia diba dimpe.
Muena mudimu assu udi ne diakalenga, pikala mfumuende upingana ku nzubu kuende, umusangana wenza mudimu assu.
Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: mfumuende neamupeshe bumfumu bua bintu biende bionsu.
Kadi pikala muena mudimu essu muntu mubi, neadiambile mundamunda ne: “Mfumuanyi nyessu ujingakana ku luendu.”
Nanku neatuadije kuluisha bena mudimu nende. Neadie, anue, pamue ne bakuatshiki ba maluvu.
Kadi mfumuende neafike dituku didi muena mudimu asvu kayi mumutekemene, ne diba didiye kayi mumanye.
Neanyoke muena mudimu assu bikole. Neamuteke muaba udibu banyoke bena mpala ibidi. Muaba awu neadile muadi, usumakaja menu.
— Nenku Bukalenga bua mu diulu nebufuanangane ne mishikankunde dikumi, ivua miangate miendu yayi, bua kuya kuakidila muntu uvua mubuele mu dibaka dituku adi.
Mishikankunde itanu isua mipote, mikuabu itanu ivua midimuke.
Mipote isua miangate miendu, kadi kayivua miangate mafuta makuabu.
Kadi midimuke isua miangate miendu, miangate ne milangi ya mafuta.
Pine apu musedianganyi kavua mufike lukasa to. Mishikankunde yonsu kubunga ne tulu, kulala.
Mundankulu, kuelabu lubila ne: “Musedianganyi ukadi ufika. Jukayi! Nuye kumuakidila.”
Nenku mishikankunde yonsu ayi kujuka ku tulu, kulongolola miendu yayi.
Mipote ayi kulomba ivua midimuke ne: “Tupeshayiku enu mafuta, bualu miendu yetu idi ikeba kujima.”
Midimuke kuandamuna ne: “Too! Bualu mafuta kaena mua kutukumbana nenu to. Nanku mbimpe nuye kudi bapanyishi, nuye kusumba enu.”
Nenku kuyayi bua kusumba mafuta. Kadi diba adi musedianganyi kufika. Mishikankunde isua mimane kudilongolola, kubuela nende mu nzubu wa dibaka. Kukangabu tshiibi tshia kumbelu.
Pashishe mishikankunde mikuabu kufika payi, ikokola ne: “Mfumu, mfumu, utunzuluile!”
Kadi musedianganyi kuandamuna ne: “Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: tshiena munumanye to.”
Nenku ikalayi batabale, bualu kanuena bamanye nansha dituku, nansha diba.
— Bidi bu muntu uvua ukeba kuya ku luendu. Kubikilaye bena mudimu bende. Kubashilaye bintu biende.
Uvua mushile umue nkanu ya mpawungi nkama itanu, mukuabu nkanu nkama ibidi, muisatu nkanu lukama, bilondeshile bukole buvua yonsu mua kukuata nabu mudimu. Pashishe kuyaye ku luendu.
Muena mudimu uvua mupete nkanu nkama itanu, diakamue kuya kuenduluka nayi. Kupetaye minga nkanu nkama itanu.
Uvua mupete nkanu nkama ibidi, kuenza kabidi momumue. Kupetaye minga nkama ibidi.
Kadi uvua mupete nkanu lukama, kuyaye kumbula tshiina mu buloba, kusokokamu nkanu ya mfumuende ayi.
Matuku mavule apita, mfumu wa bena mudimu aba kupingana, kubadika bintu ne bena mudimu bende.
Muena mudimu uvua mupete nkanu nkama itanu, kusemena kudi mfumu, kumuleja minga nkanu nkama itanu, wamba ne: “Mfumu, uvua munshile nkanu nkama itanu. Angataku minga nkama itanu eyi indi mupete.”

Mfumuende kumuandamuna ne: “Bimpe, muena mudimu wanyi muimpe, muitabi wa ku diyi dianyi. Uvua mukumbaje bimpe mudimu webe ne bintu bikese bindi mukushile. Nanku nenkushile bidi ne mushinga wa bungi. Buelaku mu tshibilu tshianyi, tusanke nebe.”
Pashishe uvua mupete nkanu nkama ibidi, kusemena kabidi, wamba ne: “Mfumu, uvua munshile nkanu nkama ibidi. Angataku minga nkama ibidi eyi indi mupete.”

Mfumuende kumuamba ne: “Bimpe, muena mudimu wanyi muimpe, muitabi wa ku diyi dianyi. Uvua mukumbaje bimpe mudimu webe ne bintu bikese bindi mukushile. Nanku nenkushile bidi ne mushinga wa bungi. Buelaku mu tshibilu tshianyi, tusanke nebe.”
Ku ndekelu muena mudimu uvua mupete nkanu lukama, kusemena kabidi, wamba ne: “Mfumu, mvua mukumanye muudi muntu wa malu makole. Udi unowa, paudi kuyi mukune; waka, paudi kuyi mumiamine ntete.
Mvua ne bowa. Nanku meme kuya kusokoka nkanu yebe mu buloba. Angataku bintu biebe, mbiebi!”
Mfumuende kuandamuna ne: “Muena mudimu mubi, wa lulengu! Uvua mumanye mundi nnowa, tshiyi mukune; ngaka, tshiyi mumiamine ntete.
“Nanku uvua ne bua kuteka nkanu yanyi mu nzubu wa bantu bavua mua kuenduluka nayi, bua mu dipingana dianyi ngapeta nkanu yanyi, ne mikuabu ya kasombela.
Nenku munyengayi nkanu idiye nayi. Nuyifde kudi muntu udi ne nkanu nkama itanu.
Bualu muntu yonsu udi ne tshintu, nebamupeshe bikuabu, bua biende bivulangane bipite. Kadi udi kayi ne tshintu, nebamunyenge ne tshikese tshidiye natshi.
Muena mudimu wa tshianana ewu, musakilayi pambelu mu midima. Adidilemu miadi, atutakaje ne menu.”
— Dituku diafika Muana wa muntu, kabidi dialejaye butumbi buende buonsu, batumibue ba Mvidi Mukulu bonsu nebikale nende. Neaye kusomba mu nkuasa wende wa butumbi.
Bisamba bionsu bia pa buloba nebisangile kumpala kuende. Neabuluje bantu ne bakuabu, bu mudi mulami wa nyama wabuluja mikoku ne mbuji ya mpumbu.
Neateke mikoku ku diende dia balume, mbuji ya mpumbu ku diende dia bakaji.
Nenku mukalenga neambile bantu badi ku diende dia balume ne: “Vuayi, nuenu badi Tatu wanyi muele lupemba. Angatayi Bukalenga buvuabu banulongoluele, katshia bafuka bukua panu.
Bualu mvua ne nzala, nuenu kumpesha tshiakudia. Mvua ne nyota, nuenu kumpesha tshiakunua. Mvua muenyi, nuenu kumbueja mu nzubu muenu.
Mvua butaka, nuenu kumvuadika tshilamba. Mvua nsama, nuenu kunkumbula. Mvua mu lukanu, nuenu kuvua kunsamba.”
Bantu ba malu mimpe nebamukonke ne: “Mfumu, diba kaayi dimvua bakumone, wewe ne nzala, tuetu kukupesha tshiakudia, nansha ne nyota, tuetu kukupesha tshiakunua?
Diba kaayi dituvua bakumone wewe muikale muenyi, tuetu kukubueja mu nzubu, nansha wewe muikale butaka, tuetu kukuvuadika tshilamba?
Diba kaayi dituvua bakumone wewe usama, nansha mu lukanu, tuetu kuvua kukusamba?”
Mukalenga neabandamune ne: “Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: bilenga bionsu binuvua benzele umue wa ku bana betu bakese aba, ke meme unuvua babienzele.”
Pashishe mukalenga neambile bantu badi ku diende dia bakaji ne: “Umbukayi pandi, nuenu badi Mvidi Mukulu muele mulawu! Nuye mu kapia ka tshiendelele, kavuabu balongoluele diabolu ne batumibue bende!
Bualu mvua ne nzala, nuenu nansha kumpesha tshiakudia: Mvua ne nyota, nuenu nansha kumpesha tshiakunua.
Mvua muenyi, nuenu nansha kumbueja mu nzubu. Mvua butaka, nuenu nansha kumvuadika tshilamba. Mvua nsama, nansha mu lukanu, nuenu nansha kuvua kunkumbula.”
Bobu kabidi nebamukonke ne: “Mfumu, diba kaayi dituvua bakumone wewe ne nzala, ne nyota, kuyi ne nzubu, muikale butaka, usama, muikale mu lukanu, tuetu kubenga ku-kuambuluisha?”
Mukalenga neabandamune ne: “Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: bilenga bionsu binuvua kanuyi benzele umue wa ku bakese aba, ke meme mene unuvua babenge kubienzela.”
Bavua benza bibi aba, nebaye mu dinyoka dia tshiendelele. Bavua benza bimpe, nebaye mu muoyi wa kashidi.
Pasua Yezu mumane kulongesha malu onsu aa, kuambilaye balongi bende ne:
— Nudi bamanye ne: tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja-Nangila netshikaleku, papita matuku abidi. Nebafile Muana wa muntu bua bamupopele pa mutshi mutshiamakane.
Diba adi bamfumu ba batuangaji ne bakulu ba bena Yuda kudisangisha mu lubanza lua mutuangaji munene, dina diende nKayifa.
Kupungabu diyi bua kukuatshisha Yezu mu budimu, kumushipesha.
Bavua bamba ne: Katuena mua kumukuata matuku a tshibilu nansha. Bualu bantu badi mua kujula tshimvundu.
Yezu uvua mu nzubu mua Simone, muena nsudi, mu Betanya.
Mukaji kampande kufika kudiye ne mulangi wa albatre, muwule ne manananshi a mushinga mukole. Kuelaye Yezu manananshi aa mu mutu pavuaye ku mesa.
Balongi ba Yezu bamona nanku, kufikabu munda, bamba ne: — Kunyanga bintu nunku bua tshinyi?
Kabavua mua kusumbisha manananshi aa ku mushinga mukole, kupesha bapele makuta anyi?
Bu muvua Yezu mumanye tshiyuabu bamba, kubabelaye ne:  Nudi nutatshisha mukaji ewu bua tshinyi?Mmungenzele bualu buimpe.
Bualu nenuikale ne bapele matuku onsu.
Udi mungele manananshi aa pambidi, mmulongolole mubidi wanyi bua kuujika bimpe.
Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: pa buloba bujima, miaba yonsu yalongeshabu Lumu lua Disanka elu, nebalondele bantu bivua mukaji ewu muenze. Nanku bantu nebamuvuluke.
Diba adi umue wa ku balongi dikumi ne babidi, dina diende Yudase Iskariyote, kuyaye kudi bamfumu ba batuangaji.
Kubakonkaye ne:  Nenumpeshe tshinyi pandi mfila Yezu kunudi? Kubalabu nkanu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole makumi asatu, kumupeshabu.
Kutuadija ku diba adi, Yudase kukeba muvuaye mua kufila Yezu kudibu, kamuyi lutatu.
Dituku dia kumpala mu tshibilu tshia Mampa kaayi mela buanga, balongi kufika kudi Yezu, bamukonka ne: Udi musue tukulongoluele didia dia Dipita dia Maweja-Nangila penyi?

Yezu kubandamuna ne:  Nuye mu tshimenga kua muntu kampanda, numuambile ne: “Mulongeshi udi wamba ne: diba dianyi didi pabuipi. Meme ne balongi banyi, netuenzele tshibilu tshia Dipita dia Maweja-Nangila kuebe.”
Balongi kuenza muvua Yezu mubambile. Kulongololabu didia dia Dipita dia Maweja-Nangila.
Ku dilolu Yezu kusomba ne balongi dikumi ne babidi ku mesa bua kudia.
Pavuabu badia, Yezu kuamba ne: Ndi nnujadikila bulelela ne: umue wa kunudi neanyile mu tshitungu.
Balongi kunyingalala bikole. Kukonkabu Yezu ku muntu ku muntu ne:  Mfumu, uudi wamba, mmeme anyi?
Yezu kuandamuna ne: Utuvua bele nende tshianza mu dilongu dimue, ke yeye wampangila.
Muana wa muntu neafue, mudi Mikanda ya tshijila kulongesha bualu buende. Kadi muntu wapangila Muana wa muntu, mmuena diakabi. Muntu awu kabavua nansha mua kumulela to.
Yudase uvua upangila Yezu, kumukonka pende ne: Mfumu wanyi, uudi wamba mmeme anyi? Yezu kumuandamuna ne: Muudi muambe amu mmomu.
Pavuabu badia, Yezu kuangata diampa, kuela Mvidi Mukulu tuasakidila, kudikosolola, kudiabanyina balongi bende, ubambila ne: Angatayi, nudie, etshi mmubidi wanyi.
Pashishe kuangataye dikopu dia maluvu a nwinyo, kuelaye kabidi Mvidi Mukulu tuasakidila, kudipesha balongi bende, wamba ne:  Nuayi bonsu bidi mu dikopu edi.
Bualu mmashi anyi, adi ashindika ndondu udi Mvidi Mukulu utua ne bantu, adibu bapuekesha bua kujimijila bantu bonsu mibi yabu.
Ndi nnujadikila ne: kutuadija ku mpindiewu, tshiakunua kabidi nwinyo ewu, too ne ku dituku dinganua nenu nwinyo mupiamupia mu Bukalenga bua Tatu wanyi.
Kuimbabu misambu ya tshibilu.  Pashishe kuyabu ku mukuna wa Olive.
Ke Yezu kuambila balongi bende ne:  Butuku ebu, nenunyeme bonsu, nunshiye nkayanyi. Bualu mu Mikanda ya tshijila mbafunde ne: “Nenshipe mulami wa mikoku, yoyi neitangalake.”
Kadi meme mumane kubika ku lufu, nenye kunuindila mu Ngalileya.
Ke Petro kumuandamuna ne: Nansha bonsu banyema, bakushiya, kadi meme tshiakunyema to.
Yezu kumuambila ne: Ndi nkujadikila bulelela ne: butuku ebu, tshitala katshiyi tshianji kusama, wewe newikale mumane kunwila misangu isatu ne: tshiena mumumanye to.

Petro kumuambila ne: Kashidi tshiakukuvila ne: tshiena mumumanye to. Nansha bua lufu, netufue nebe.
Balongi bakuabu bonsu kuamba kabidi amu nanku.
Ke Yezu ne balongi bende kufika mu lupangu ludibu binyika ne: Ngetsemani.  Kubambilaye ne: Sombayi apa. Ntshidi mpengama kuaka bua kutendelela.
Ke Yezu kuya ne Petro, kabidi ne bana babidi ba Zebede. Kutuadijaye kubungama ne kupampakana.
Nanku kubambilaye ne: Muoyi wanyi udi ne dibungama dia lufu. Shalayi apa. Kanuladi tulu to. Tuikale batabale bonsu.

Yezu kupengama katantshi, kudiela mpala panshi, utendelela, wamba ne: Tatu wanyi, pikalabi mua kuenzeka, ungumushile dikopu edi dia dikenga. Kadi bienzeke muudi musue wewe, kabienzeki mundi musue meme.

Yezu kupingana kudi balongi bende, kubasangana balale tulu. Kukonkaye Petro ne: Kanuvua ne bukole bua kushala nanyi batabale nansha bua diba dimue bua tshinyi? 41Tabalayi. Tendelelayi, bua kanubuedi mu mateyi. Muoyi wa kuenza bimpe nudi nawu, kadi bukole bua kubikumbaja, kanuena nabu.
Tabalayi. Tendelelayi, bua kanubuedi mu mateyi. Muoyi wa kuenza bimpe nudi nawu, kadi bukole bua kubikumbaja, kanuena nabu.
Ke Yezu kuya kutendelela ku luseke musangu muibidi, wamba ne: Tatu wanyi, bu dikopu edi kadiyi mua kumuka kundi, tshiyi mudinue, bienzeke amu muudi musue!
Kupinganaye tshiakabidi kudi balongi bende, kubasangana balale bikole. Mesu abu avua maneme bujitu.
Yezu kubashiya kabidi, kuya kutendelela ku luseke musangu muisatu, wambulula amu miaku ya momumue.
Pashishe kupinganaye kudi balongi bende, kubambila ne:  Nutshidi anu balale, bikishe? Monayi diba didibu bafila Muana wa muntu mu bianza bia bantu babi ndimane kukumbana.
Jukayi! Tuyayi! Tangilayi, muntu udi umfila kudibu, nyeye awu!
Patshivua Yezu wakula nanku, Yudase, umue wa ku dikumi ne babidi, kufika ne bantu bavule, bikale ne miele, kabidi ne mitshi. Ke bamfumu ba batuangaji ne bakulu ba bena Yuda bavua babatuma.
Nanku Yudase uvua mupangile Yezu, ukavua mumane kumanyisha bantu ne: “Ungatua mishiku awu, ke yeye unudi nukeba, numukuate!”
Ke Yudase kufika diakamue kudi Yezu, umuela muoyi: Mfumu, muoyi awu! Pashishe kumutuaye mishiku.
Yezu kumuamba ne: Mulunda wanyi, tshiudi musue kuenza, utshikumbaje lukasa. Nanku bavua Yudase nabu kusemena kudi Yezu, kumukuata, kumulama bikole.
Umue wa ku bavua ne Yezu kupatula muele wende, kutapa muena mudimu wa mutuangaji munene, kumukosa ditshi.
Ke Yezu kumuamba ne: Pingaja muele webe mu tshibubu. Bualu yonsu watula muele, neafue ku muele.
Kuena mumanye ne: ndi mua kubila Tatu wanyi, Yeye kuntumina amu mpindiewu batumibue bende bapite pa bisumbu dikumi ne bibidi bua kungambuluisha.
Kadi meme muenze nanku, malu adi mu Mikanda ya tshijila neakumbane bishi? Bualu mu mikanda amu mbafunde ne: bienzeke amu nanku.
Diba mene adi Yezu kukonka bantu ne: Nuvua ne bua kufika ne miele ne mitshi bua kunkuata meme anyi? Ndi muivi anyi? Mvua ndongesha matuku onsu mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu, kadi kanuena bankuate to.
Kadi bionsu abi mbienzeke bua kukumbaja miaku ya bambi idibu bafunde mu Mikanda ya tshijila. Ke balongi bende bonsu kumushiya, kunyema.
Bavua bakuate Yezu, kuyabu kumufila kua Kayifa, mutuangaji munene, mu nzubu muvua balongeshi ba mikenji ne bakulu ba bena Yuda basangile.
Petro uvua ulonda Yezu pa bule, too ne ku lupangu lua mutuangaji munene. Kubuelaye mu lubanza. Kusombaye pamue ne bena mudimu bavua balama tshiibi, bua kumona muakosabu tshilumbu.
Bamfumu ba batuangaji ne bena Tshipangu tshikulu bonsu, bavua bakeba bualu bua dishima bua kudingila Yezu, bua bamone mua kumufundila tshibawu tshia lufu.
Kadi nansha muvua bantu bavule bafike bua kumudingila malu, kabakapeta bualu nansha bumue to. Ku ndekelu bantu babidi kufika,
61bamba ne: Muntu ewu uvua wamba ne: “Ndi mua kupula nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu ewu, kumuibakulula mu matuku asatu.”
Ke mutuangaji munene kujuka, kukonka Yezu ne: Kuena wandamuna anyi? Malu adi bantu aba bakujadikila ngwowu anyi?
Kadi Yezu uvua amu mupuwe. Ke mutuangaji munene kukonka Yezu ne: Mu dina dia Mvidi Mukulu udi ne muoyi, ndi nkulomba bua utuandamune, uditshipe. Udi Kristu, Muana wa Mvidi Mukulu anyi?

Ke Yezu kumuandamuna ne: Muudi muambe amu mmomu. Kadi ndi nnujadikila ne: kutuadija ku mpindiewu nenumone Muana wa muntu musombe ku dia balume dia Mvidi Mukulu wa bukole buonsu. Nenumumone kabidi upueka mu mavuba a mu diulu.
Ke mutuangaji munene kudipanda bilamba, wamba ne:  Mmupende Mvidi Mukulu! Katutshiena tukengela bajadiki ba bualu ebu kabidi to! Nudi bumvue amu mpindiewu mudiye mupende Mvidi Mukulu.
Nudi nukosa tshilumbu tshiende bishi? Kumuandamunabu ne: Muntu awu mmuena tshibawu! Tshiende ndufu!
Pashishe bamue kumufuila mate mu mpala, kumututa bisusu. Bakuabu kumukuma mapi,
bamba ne: Wewe Kristu, utshinke, utuambile: udi mukutute nnganyi?
Petro uvua mu lupangu, musombe pambelu. Muena mudimu mukaji kusemena kudiye, umuamba ne:  Wewe kabidi uvua ne Yezu, muntu wa mu Ngalileya awu.
Kadi Petro kuyila, bantu bonsu bateleja, wamba ne: Tshiena mumanye buudi musue kuamba.
Pashishe Petro kuya ku tshiibi tshia lupangu. Mukuabu mukaji muena mudimu kumumona, kuambila bantu bavua kaba aku ne: Muntu ewu uvua ne Yezu wa mu Nazarete.
Ke Petro kuyila tshiakabidi, ujadika ne: Ndi nditshipa ne: Tshiena mumanye muntu ewu to.
Kunyima kua katupa, bavua muaba awu, kusemenabu kudi Petro, bamuamba ne: Bulelela udi umue wa kudibu. Tudi bumvue ku ngakuilu webe kuudi ufuma!
Ke Petro kuamba ne: Bu meme nshima, Mvidi Mukulu annyoke! Ndi nditshipa ne: tshiena mumanye muntu ewu nansha! Amu diba adi, tshitala kusamatshi.
Petro kuvuluka tshivua Yezu mumuambile ne: “Tshitala katshiyi tshianji kusama, newikale mumane kunwila misangu isatu ne: tshiena mumanye muntu awu to. ” Ke Petro kupatuka, wenda udila bikole.
Patshiatshia, bamfumu bonsu ba batuangaji, ne bakulu ba bena Yuda, kupunga diyi dia kushipesha Yezu.
Kumusuikishabu mionji, kuyabu nende kua Pilate, muena Rome, uvua mulombodi wa ditunga adi.

Yudase, uvua mupangile Yezu, umona ne: tubafundile Yezu tshibawu tshia lufu, kunyingalalaye. Kuyaye kupingajila bamfumu ba batuangaji ne bakulu ba bena Yuda, nkanu makumi asatu ya tshiamu tshitoke ayi.
Kubambilaye ne:  Ndi muenze bibi, mufikishe ku lufu muntu udi kayi ne bualu. Kadi kumuandamunabu ne: Bualu buetu anyi? Abu mbualu buebe!
Yudase kuimansha nkanu ayi mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu, kumukaye. Pashishe kuyaye kudiowa.
Bamfumu ba batuangaji kuangula nkanu ayi, bamba ne: Mikenji yetu kayena mianyishe bua kuela nkanu eyi mu tshibutshilu tshia mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu, bualu mmushinga mufume ku mashi a bantu.
Bobu bamane kumyuangana, kusumbabu budimi bua mufumbi wa ngesu ku nkanu eyi, bua kujikamu benyi.
Ke padibu binyika budimi abu ne ku lelu ne: “mBudimi bua mashi.”
Nanku miaku ya muambi Yirmeya kukumbanayi ya ne: “Kuangatabu nkanu makumi asatu ya tshiamu tshitoke tshia mushinga mukole (ke mushinga uvua bena Izrayele bumvuangane bua kufuta bualu buende),
kusumbabu nayi budimi bua mufumbi wa ngesu, bu muvua Maweja-Nangila mungambile bua kuenza.
Yezu kuimana kumpala kua mulombodi wa ditunga adi. Awu kumuebeja ne: — Udi mukalenga wa bena Yuda anyi? Yezu kuandamuna ne: Anu muudi muambe amu.
Kadi pavua bamfumu ba batuangaji ne bakulu bamusonguela, kavua wandamuna to.
Ke Pilate kumukonka ne: Kuena mumvue malu onsu adibu bakufunda anyi?
Kadi Yezu kavua mumuandamune kalu nansha kamue. Nanku mulombodi wa ditunga kukema bikole.
Mu tshibilu tshionsu tshia Dipita dia Maweja-Nangila, mulombodi wa ditunga uvua ne tshibidilu tshia kulekela muena lukanu umue, uvua bantu mua kusungula.
Nanku tshikondu atshi, kuvua muena lukanu wa dilambu. Dina diende Yezu Barabase.
Ke Pilate kukonka bantu bavua basangile muaba awu ne: Unudi basue nnulekele, nnganyi? Yezu Barabase anyi, peshi Yezu udibu binyika ne: nKristu?
Bualu Pilate uvua mumanye bimpe ne: bena Yuda mbafunde Yezu kudiye anu bualu bavua nende lukuna.

Pavua Pilate mu kabadi ulumbuluisha, mukajende kumutumina mukenji ne: “Kubuelakanyi mu tshilumbu tshia muntu udi kayi ne bualu awu. Bualu butuku bua lelu, ndi mukenge bikole mu tshilota bualu buende.”
Bamfumu ba batuangaji ne bakulu kuambila bantu ne: nulombe bua balekele Barabase, bafundile Yezu tshibawu tshia lufu.
Mulombodi kubakonka kabidi ne: — Ku babidi aba, unudi basue nnulekele, nnganyi? Bobu kumuandamuna ne: Anu Barabase!
Ke Pilate kubebeja ne: Kadi Yezu udibu binyika ne: Kristu, ngenze nende tshinyi? Bonsu kuandamuna ne: Umupopele pa mutshi mutshiamakane!
Pilate kubakonka ne: Mmuenze bualu bubi kaayi? Kadi kuelabu mbila mikole mipite, bamba ne: Umupopele pa mutshi mutshiamakane!

Pilate umona ne: kumuena mushindu wa kutungunuka, bualu mutoyi wa bantu uvua anu wenda uvulangana, kuangataye mayi, kowaye bianza, bantu batangile,  wamba ne: Tshilumbu tshia lufu lua muntu ewu katshinkuatshi! Buenu bualu!
Bantu bonsu kuandamuna ne:  Bua lufu luende, batunyoke amu tuetu ne bana betu!
Nanku Pilate kubalekela Barabase, kututshisha Yezu mikaba. Kutumaye kabidi diyi bua bapopele Yezu pa mutshi mutshiamakane.
Basolayi ba Pilate kuya ne Yezu mu lubanza lua mulombodi wa ditunga. Kunguilabu bonsu muaba uvua Yezu.
Kuvulabu Yezu bilamba, kumuvuadika tshinkutu tshikunze.
Pashishe kujingabu tshikata tshia mionji ya meba, kumuasa ku mutu. Kumupeshabu dilenga mu tshianza tshiende tshia balume. Bavua batua binu kumpala kuende, bamuseka ne: Muoyi, mukalenga wa bena Yuda!
Bavua bamutuila mate, bangata dilenga, bamufuta nadi ku mutu.
Bobu bamane kumuseka, kumuvulabu tshinkutu, kumuvuadika bilamba biende, kuya nende bua bamupopele pa mutshi mutshiamakane.
Pavuabu bumuka mu tshimenga, kusangilabu ne muntu wa mu musoku wa Sirene. Dina diende nSimone. Basolayi kumukolela bua ambule mutshi mutshiamakane wa Yezu.

Pilate umona ne: kumuena mushindu wa kutungunuka, bualu mutoyi wa bantu uvua anu wenda uvulangana, kuangataye mayi, kowaye bianza, bantu batangile,  wamba ne: Tshilumbu tshia lufu lua muntu ewu katshinkuatshi! Buenu bualu!
Muaba awu kupeshabu Yezu nwinyo, musambakaja ne bintu bia bululu. Yezu ulabula, kubengaye mua kunua.
Kumupopelabu pa mutshi mutshiamakane. Kuabanyanganabu bilamba biende, bilondeshile muvuabu batshinke.
Pashishe kusombabu muaba awu bua kumulama.
Kufundabu pa dibaya miaku idi ileja bualu buvuabu bamushipele ne: “Ewu Yezu, mukalenga wa bena Yuda.” Kupopelabu dibaya adi pa mutshi mutshiamakane kulu kua mutu wende.
Pashishe bavua bapopela kabidi bivi babidi pa mitshi mitshiamakane, ewu ku dia balume, mukuabu ku dia bakaji dia Yezu.
Bantu bavua bapitshila muaba awu, bavua bashikula mutu, bapenda  Yezu,
bamba ne: Wewe uvua musue kuupula nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu, kuasulula mukuabu mu matuku asatu. Nanku dipandisha wewe muine. Pawikala Muana wa Mvidi Mukulu, tuluka ku mutshi mutshiamakane!
Bamfumu ba batuangaji, balongeshi ba mikenji, ne bakulu, bavua bamuseka kabidi, bamba ne:
— Yeye ewu uvua musungidile bantu bakuabu. Kadi kena mua kudisungidila bua tshinyi? Yeye kena mukalenga wa Izrayele anyi? Atuluke mpindiewu ku mutshi mutshiamakane, netumuitabe!
Uvua mutekemene kudi Mvidi Mukulu. Nanku bu Mvidi Mukulu umunanga bushuwa, amusungidile mpindiewu! Bualu uvua ujadika ne: “Ndi Muana wa Mvidi Mukulu.”
Bivi bavuabu bapopela pa mitshi mitshiamakane pabuipi ne Yezu, bavua bamupenda kabidi amu nanku.
Munda munya, midima kuenzeka mu ditunga dijima. Kunengayi meba asatu.
Pa diba disatu dia musendamu, Yezu kuela diyi dikole ne: — Eli, Eli, lama sabaktanyi? (mmumue ne: “Mvidi Mukulu wanyi, Mvidi Mukulu wanyi, wakundekela bua tshinyi?")
Bantu bakuabu bavua muaba awu bumvua nanku, kuambabu ne: Udi ubikila Eliya!
Diakamue umue wa kudibu kuya lukasa, kuambula musukulampampa, kuutuaye mu maluvu a buanji, kuusuika ku lusongu lua dilenga, kuusemejila Yezu bua anue.
Kadi bantu bakuabu kuamba ne:  Indila, tutangile Eliya, ne wafika bua kumusungidila!
Yezu kuela kabidi lubila lukole, kukula muoyi.
Diba adi, tshilamba tshiyuabu balembeleje mu nzubu wa Mvidi Mukulu kupandikatshi kulu ne panshi bitupa bibidi. Buloba kuzakala, mbuebue kuela mitanta,
nkita kubuluka. Bantu bafue ba bungi bavua bitaba Mvidi Mukulu, kubikabu.
Kupatukabu mu nkita. Yezu mumane kubika ku lufu, kubuelabu mu tshimenga tshia tshijila tshia Yerushalayime. Bantu ba bungi bavua babamone mu tshimenga amu.

Mulombodi wa basolayi muena Rome, ne basolayi bende bavua balame Yezu pamue nende, bamona muvua buloba buzakala, ne bionsu bitua bienzeka, kutshinabu bikole, bamba ne: “Muntu ewu utua Muana wa Mvidi Mukulu bulelela!”
Bakaji ba bungi batua kuine aku, batangile pa bule. Bobu ke bavua balonda Yezu biangatshile ku Ngalileya bua kumuambuluisha.
Munkatshi muabu mutua Mariya wa mu tshimenga tshia Magdala, Mariya mamuende wa Yakobe ne Yozefe, ne mamuende wa bana ba Zebede.
Dilolu, muena biuma wa mu tshimenga tshia Arimateya kufika. Dina diende Yozefe. Utua kabidi mulongi wa Yezu.
Kuyaye kua Pilate bua kulomba tshitalu tshia Yezu. Nanku Pilate kuanyisha bua batshipeshe Yozefe.
Awu kutshiangata, kutshikuta mu tshilamba tshipiatshipia.
Pashishe kulongaye tshitalu atshi mu lukita luende lupialupia, luvuaye mumbuishe mu lubuebue. Kubungulujaye dibue dinene bua kubuikila mushiku wa lukita, kuyaye.
Mariya wa mu Magdala, ne Mariya mukuabu, bavua muaba awu, basombe, batangila ku lukita.
Butshia dinda, mmumue ne dituku dia Dikisha,
Kumuambilabu ne: Mukalenga, tudi tuvuluka muvua muena dishima ewu, pavuaye ne muoyi, muambe ne: “Kunyima kua matuku asatu, nembike ku bafue.”

Nanku anyisha, utume diyi bua balame lukita too ne dituku disatu, bua balongi bende kabavu kuiba tshitalu tshiende, bambila bantu ne: “Wabiki ku bafue.” Dishima dia nanku nedikale dibi dipite dia kumpala.
Pilate kubambila ne: Ke basolayi aba. Nuye nabu, balame lukita bimpe munudi basue.
Nanku kuyabu kulongolola mudimu wa kulama lukita. Kutuabu dibue divua dibuikila lukita tshitampi, kushiyabu basolayi bua balulame.
Dituku dia Dikisha dimane kupita, patshiatshia dituku dia kumpala dia lumingu, Mariya wa mu Magdala, ne Mariya mukuabu, kufikabu bua kumona lukita.
Diakamue buloba kuzakala bikole. Mutumibue wa Maweja-Nangila kutuluka mu diulu, kubunguluja dibue divua ku lukita ku luseke, kusombapu.
Mutumibue awu uvua ukenka bu muele wa mvula. Bilamba biende bivua bitoke too bu ndanda.
Basolayi bavua balama lukita, kukuatshikabu bowa, kuzakala, kufua tshipuka.
Ke mutumibue awu kuambila bakaji ne:  Kanutshinyi to. Ndi mumanye ne: nudi nukeba Yezu, uvuabu bapopele pa mutshi mutshiamakane.
Kena apa to. Ukadi mubike ku bafue muvuaye muambe. Kanumonayi muaba uvua tshitalu tshiende.
Nanku nuye lukasa. Nuambile balongi bende ne: “Ukadi mubike ku bafue. Udi unudianjidila mu Ngalileya.  Ke muaba unuaya kumumuena.” Ke tshimvua ne bua kunuambila.
Bakumuka lukasa lukasa ku lukita, ne disanka dinene, kabidi ne bowa munda tente. Kuyabu lubilu bua kumanyisha balongi ba Yezu bualu abu.
Diakamue Yezu kusambakena nabu, wamba ne: Bupole buikale nenu. Kusemenabu pabuipi nende, kumupukila ku makasa, kumukukuila.
Yezu kubambila ne: Kanutshinyi to. Nuye, nuambile bana betu bua kuyabu mu Ngalileya. Ke muayabu kummuena.
Patshivua bakaji baya mu njila, basolayi bakuabu balami ba lukita, kufikabu mu tshimenga, balondela bamfumu ba batuangaji bionsu bivua bienzeka.
Nanku bamfumu ba batuangaji ne bakulu kudisangisha. Kupungabu diyi bua kubuejila basolayi. Kubapeshabu makuta a bungi,
babambile ne: Nenujadike ne: balongi bende mbafike mundankulu. Kuibabu tshitalu tshiende patu-vua balale tulu.
Kadi pikala mulombodi wa ditunga mumvue bualu abu, netuyukile nende bua kantatshishi.
Basolayi bavua bangata makuta, kuenzabu muvuabu babambile. Bena Yuda badi balondelangana bualu ebu nanku too ne ku lelu.
Balongi ba Yezu dikumi ne umue kuya mu Ngalileya, pa mukuna uvuaye mubambile.
Pavuabu bamumone, bavua bamukukuila. Kadi bamue ba kudibu batshivua belakana.
Ke Yezu kusemena pabuipi nabu, ubambila ne:  Mvidi Mukulu mmumpeshe bumfumu buonsu mu diulu ne pa buloba.
Nenku nuye kudi bantu ba bisamba bionsu. Nubenze balongi banyi. Nubatue mu mayi mu dina dia Tatu, dia Muana, ne dia Mueyelu wa Tshijila.
Nubalongesha kabidi mua kukumbaja bionsu bimvua munuambile. Manyayi ne: Meme nengikale nenu matuku onsu, too ne ku ndekelu kua bidimu.
